thread.title: Finra would allow brokers to block trades to protect seniors
thread.title_full: Finra would allow brokers to block trades to protect seniors

author: Financial News
title: Finra would allow brokers to block trades to protect seniors
text:
Finra would allow brokers to block trades to protect seniors By Anna Prior, The Wall Street Journal 18 September 2015 Financial firms that believe an older client is being taken advantage of would be allowed to temporarily block requested disbursements of cash or securities from an account, under a proposal approved Thursday by the Financial Industry Regulatory Authorityâ€™s board.
